---
# Docker host (jetstream) with openmrs instances
users:
 bamboo:
  comment: CI Bamboo User
  groups: 'admin'
  ssh_key: "ssh-rsa  bambooagent"
 djazayeri:
  comment: Darius Jazayeri
  groups: 'admin'
  ssh_key: "ssh-rsa  jazayeri@alum.mit.edu"
 dkayiwa:
  comment: Daniel Kayiwa
  groups: 'admin'
  ssh_key: "ssh-rsa  danielkayiwa@Daniel-Kayiwas-MacBook-Pro.local"
 raff:
  comment: Rafal
  groups: 'admin'
  ssh_key: "ssh-rsa  raff"

datadog_config:
  tags: "provider:jetstream-tacc,environment:{{datadog_environment}},service:openmrs-refapp,ansible:full,provisioner:manual"

docker_deployment:
 - demo
 - qa-refapp
 - modules-refapp
 - uat-refapp

docker_deployable_images:
 - repository: openmrs-reference-application-distro
   compose: demo,qa-refapp,modules-refapp,uat-refapp

letsencrypt_cert_domains:
  - garissa.openmrs.org
  - demo.openmrs.org
  - qa-refapp.openmrs.org
  - modules-refapp.openmrs.org
  - uat-refapp.openmrs.org

nginx_vhosts:
 - listen: "80 default_server"
   server_name: "demo.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
 - listen: "443 ssl"
   server_name: "demo.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     access_log /var/log/nginx/demo_access.log;
     error_log /var/log/nginx/demo_error.log;
     ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/fullchain.pem;
     ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/privkey.pem;
     location / {
       return 301 https://demo.openmrs.org/openmrs;
     }
     location /openmrs {
       proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8080/openmrs;
     }
 - listen: "80"
   server_name: "qa-refapp.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
 - listen: "443 ssl"
   server_name: "qa-refapp.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     access_log /var/log/nginx/qa-refapp_access.log;
     error_log /var/log/nginx/qa-refapp_access.log;
     ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/fullchain.pem;
     ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/privkey.pem;
     location / {
       return 301 https://qa-refapp.openmrs.org/openmrs;
     }
     location /openmrs {
       proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8081/openmrs;
     }
 - listen: "80"
   server_name: "modules-refapp.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
 - listen: "443 ssl"
   server_name: "modules-refapp.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     access_log /var/log/nginx/modules_access.log;
     error_log /var/log/nginx/modules_error.log;
     ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/fullchain.pem;
     ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/privkey.pem;
     location / {
       return 301 https://modules-refapp.openmrs.org/openmrs;
     }
     location /openmrs {
       proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8082/openmrs;
     }
 - listen: "80"
   server_name: "uat-refapp.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
 - listen: "443 ssl"
   server_name: "uat-refapp.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     access_log /var/log/nginx/uat_access.log;
     error_log /var/log/nginx/uat_error.log;
     ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/fullchain.pem;
     ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/privkey.pem;
     location / {
       return 301 https://uat-refapp.openmrs.org/openmrs;
     }
     location /openmrs {
       proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8083/openmrs;
       }
 - listen: "443 ssl"
   server_name: "garissa.openmrs.org"
   extra_parameters: |
     access_log /var/log/nginx/deployer_access.log;
     error_log /var/log/nginx/deployer_error.log;
     ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/fullchain.pem;
     ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/garissa.openmrs.org/privkey.pem;
     location / {
       proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3000/;
     }
